title: Fortification #5
author: Princess Andrea
pages: My humble abode is expanding! 🏰 I've built a delightful stone boundary. It feels safer already. 🧱
A grand gate stands sturdy. Trespassers beware! Let's adorn it with flowers. 🌼
Each day, I feel more at home. Learning curves delight me now. Growth is a marvel. 📈
